content.raw:
it's failing because joint control parameters need to be set (see changes to wheel_slip.cc)

if you test with `gazebo10` (since it has the JointControlPlugin from pull request #2751), I think the following patch will let it work just by opening the world

~~~
diff -r 7c4281fe1229 test/worlds/trisphere_cycle_wheel_slip.world
--- a/test/worlds/trisphere_cycle_wheel_slip.world	Mon Aug 26 17:17:47 2019 +0000
+++ b/test/worlds/trisphere_cycle_wheel_slip.world	Wed Sep 18 12:05:53 2019 -0700
@@ -32,6 +32,24 @@
           <wheel_normal_force>32</wheel_normal_force>
         </wheel>
       </plugin>
+      <plugin name="joint_control" filename="libJointControlPlugin.so">
+        <controller type="position">
+          <joint>wheel_front_steer</joint>
+          <target>0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0.1</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="velocity">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>6.0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="force">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>2.15</target>
+        </controller>
+      </plugin>
     </include>
 
     <include>
@@ -55,6 +73,24 @@
           <wheel_normal_force>32</wheel_normal_force>
         </wheel>
       </plugin>
+      <plugin name="joint_control" filename="libJointControlPlugin.so">
+        <controller type="position">
+          <joint>wheel_front_steer</joint>
+          <target>0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0.1</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="velocity">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>6.0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="force">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>2.15</target>
+        </controller>
+      </plugin>
     </include>
 
     <gui fullscreen='0'>
~~~
content.html:
it's failing because joint control parameters need to be set (see changes to wheel_slip.cc)

if you test with gazebo10 (since it has the JointControlPlugin from pull request #2751), I think the following patch will let it work just by opening the world

diff -r 7c4281fe1229 test/worlds/trisphere_cycle_wheel_slip.world
--- a/test/worlds/trisphere_cycle_wheel_slip.world  Mon Aug 26 17:17:47 2019 +0000
+++ b/test/worlds/trisphere_cycle_wheel_slip.world  Wed Sep 18 12:05:53 2019 -0700
@@ -32,6 +32,24 @@
           <wheel_normal_force>32</wheel_normal_force>
         </wheel>
       </plugin>
+      <plugin name="joint_control" filename="libJointControlPlugin.so">
+        <controller type="position">
+          <joint>wheel_front_steer</joint>
+          <target>0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0.1</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="velocity">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>6.0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="force">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>2.15</target>
+        </controller>
+      </plugin>
     </include>

     <include>
@@ -55,6 +73,24 @@
           <wheel_normal_force>32</wheel_normal_force>
         </wheel>
       </plugin>
+      <plugin name="joint_control" filename="libJointControlPlugin.so">
+        <controller type="position">
+          <joint>wheel_front_steer</joint>
+          <target>0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0.1</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="velocity">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>6.0</target>
+          <pid_gains>9 0 0</pid_gains>
+        </controller>
+        <controller type="force">
+          <joint>wheel_rear_left_spin</joint>
+          <joint>wheel_rear_right_spin</joint>
+          <target>2.15</target>
+        </controller>
+      </plugin>
     </include>

     <gui fullscreen='0'>
